slide.title: Unbundling Extensions
slide.blurb: The following extensions are following 🦕 and 🦖, like when the ☄️ hit:
slide.div:
%ext/recode%
← Depends on the Recode library which had its latest release in 2001
→ Alternative: %iconv% Unbundle ext/recode https://wiki.php.net/rfc/unbundle_recode

%ext/wddx%
← Entirely useless as everybody now uses JSON for this
→ Moved to Siberia^WPECL ☃️ ❄️ ⛄ Unbundle ext/wddx https://wiki.php.net/rfc/deprecate-and-remove-ext-wddx

%ext/interbase%
← Access to Interbase and Firebird databases
→ Moved to PECL Deprecate and remove ext/interbase https://wiki.php.net/rfc/deprecate-and-remove-ext-interbase
